reviews.review:
Portal 2 is a classic. A timeless masterpiece of puzzles, story line, and humour. There are hidden gems and lore hidden through out the game so keep your eye's open while solving and adventuring. Portal 2 does offer a longer story line than portal 1 and keeps you interested through out as it develops. though this game was made some years ago, graphically it still holds up in later years. the puzzles are In my opinion on the difficult side of medium difficulty. Where some puzzles may give people a challenge and you'll have to think it though logically, but others are straight forward. over all still one my Fav puzzle games.

Overall gameplay/experience: 9/10
Graphics: 7.5/10
story: 10/10
cake: a lie

Portal 2 başarılı bir şekilde detaylandırılmış kurgusu içinde özel ve eğlenceli bir hikayeyi bize anlatıyor. Bulmacalar zor değil ilgi çekici. En tatmin edici yöne ise co-op modunda sunduğu tamamen yenilikçi yapı. Portal 2 dikkat çekecek derecede tatminkâr.
для этой игры я тоже слишком тупой
this is the best game valve made so far aside from hl, i have 50 hours of playtime :D
GLaDOS is still the best AI I've ever had the pleasure of trying to kill. Twice.
Рекомендую игру всем, все 2 части игра полный улёт скучно не будет а если ты ещё с другом то вообще заебись.
Really fun i play it every day and its a good storyline
i have never played a story in my life that has made me want to play it over and over again after completing it. i want more of these characters and this world so bad it makes me ill
Incredible game in all aspects. Would recommend to anyone, even if they have never played another video game.
Great game! Don't need the backstory of portal 1, but it's always nice to have!

명작은 명작인 이유가 있다...
정가를 주고 구매해도 아깝지 않을, 그만큼 가치있는 게임
Günde 1 buçuk saatten fazla oynamayın beyniniz eriyebilir.

I enjoyed playing Portal 2 even 11 years after Release. The singleplayer campain is fun and the story is okay for such a simple game. Co-Op can be a challange! Try those achievments. A few are really on point!
Super hra. Všem jí moc doporučuji.
The best god damn game I have ever played number 2, please just trust me it's amazing

재밌습니다 
다들 한번쯤 해보시긿 바랍니다
감자도스가 친절하ㅑ니다

[h1] Portal 2 [/h1]
[hr][/hr]
Amazing game, loved every minute of it, would [b] 100% recommend. [/b]

Très bon jeux d'énigme, il dépasse de loin plein d'autres jeux, les énigme se complique de plus en plus et l'histoire est vraiment bien, je recommande ce jeux en solo comme en Coop car oui il y a un mode Coop pour jouer avec sont pote, et le coop n'est pas juste comme la campagne mais en coop, nan ils on fait de nouveau niveaux exprès pour, donc pour finir Portal 2 est un très bon jeux

예전에 구매 했지만 미루다가 드디어 플레이 해봤습니다

하다보니 재미가 붙어 이틀동안 틈틈히해서 싱글 엔딩 봤네요

전작보다 맵이 훨씬 많고 공략없어도 되는 난이도의 구성입니다

중간에 한번 막히긴 했지만 세이브 로드가 자유롭기 때문에 

부담없이 10시간정도 플레이 타임으로 클리어 하실 게임이 필요하다면 딱입니다
Amazing game filled with lore adventure and comedy!
Очень замечательная игра моего детства, превосходный сюжет который цепляет и держит в напряжении. Полностью в восторге!!

I first thought Portal was a horror game and was terrified to play it, but I'm so glad I did.
Portal 1 & 2 are probably some of the best games I've ever played. Got me attached to a tiny robot man, made me cry, made me cry some more, 10/10 great gaming experience.
Я сначала не понял что произошло потом вау это же ГЛаДОС тот самый рекомендую класная игра :) также графика класная музыка класная геймплей сложный для меня очень крута

Portal 2 é excelente, essencial.

Nesse jogo você deve resolver quebra-cabeças utilizando uma arma capaz de criar portais pra acessar diferentes lugares. O nível de inventividade e criatividade dos quebra-cabeças é muito surpreendente.

Recomendo muito o modo coop, que ao levar essa experiência para dois jogadores, e ter de descobrir os desafios, conversando e se impressionando juntos, debatendo as ideias e possibilidades de como resolver tudo, torna o modo cooperativo muito divertido e tendo como chave, o diálogo.

Excelente!

Trecho de texto criado para o projeto Um Jogo Me Disse.
A good puzzle game you need a brain to figure some stuff out but yea i recommend it.
listen just play it man it's really REALLY GOOD
this game funny af, that wheatley is a goofy ah mfer but he funny af and I trust him with my life
Great game, always loved that puzzle type game. If you like puzzles this game is right up your ally
Obra de arte em sua melhor forma!
Здравствуйте! В целом, игра хороша, большие Карты, загадочные головоломки, классная графика, озвучка. Мне очень нравится эта игра.

I love this game, even more than the first one. The end credits got me tearing up. The graphics are good, the story is great, gameplay is amazing, puzzles are amazing too, and the price? $10!?!?!? Buy this game right now.
alto juegardo, encima sale más barato que un sandwich de mila en lo de mari, literal q god
This game is funny, challenging, and has great graphics. Highly recommended.
Sinceramente só comprei por comprar mas mesmo assim o game é bom, dá pra jogar com amigos, e sim... roda na minha calculadora de 4gb de ram com placa mãe de notebook e sem suporte a placas de vídeos.
Este juego es el papusito de mi ete sech

It's Portal 2,
if you need convincing you need a therapist

The story of this game is great!
Got both and played through them both
Portal 1 I beat 3 times
Portal 2 I beat 2 times
Very fun and a great game to force you to use google chrome or explode your head
A great game, its been out for 11 years but still holds up well. Story and Co-Op very good and well written. Lots of secrets and Easter eggs to be found, a PC gaming classic. 10-10 would recommend.
Super fun singleplayer and incredible co-op!
